name: Jas Wilkins

topics.response_text: Let me ask you a question - what's the tastiest thing you've ever eaten?

topics.topic_text: {Cannibal}People have a rather unique taste, I've discovered.
topics.response_text: Uh... hmm... well, no accounting for taste I guess. Anyway...

{slightly excited, has a passion for cooking exotic recipes}I've got this recipe for a Deathclaw Omelet that I've been itching to try out. Trouble is - I need a Deathclaw egg. Kinda obvious, I suppose.

topics.topic_text: {Ghastly Scavenger}Ghouls and Super Mutants sometimes taste like Brahmin steaks.
topics.response_text: You're just pulling my leg, right? Why would anyone... uh... never mind. Anyway...

topics.topic_text: Anything that wasn't made 200 years ago.
topics.response_text: {amused}Ha. Yeah, can you believe some people still eat that stuff? Anyway...

topics.topic_text: Where did you come up with this recipe?
topics.response_text: My great-aunt Rose ran a bed and breakfast back in California, in a town called Modoc. She's the one who created the recipe in the first place.

topics.topic_text: Where can I find a Deathclaw egg?
topics.response_text: The quarry just north of here is full of Deathclaws, so there's bound to be an egg or two in there somewhere.

topics.topic_text: What are you offering in exchange for a Deathclaw egg?
topics.response_text: I don't have much in the way of money, but I'd be willing to share the secret of the recipe.
All right. Do you need anything to eat or drink?

topics.topic_text: I had some questions about this place.
topics.response_text: Sure. What did you want to know?

topics.topic_text: Show me what you have for sale.
You don't look like a quarry worker.
topics.response_text: Oh, I'm not. I'm making my way to New Vegas. They say anything goes there, and best of all, the NCR can't mess it up for you.
Born and raised. Things back in California are better than they've ever been, according to my grandpa.
Well, there's the Deathclaws, of course, and there was that one group of Powder Gangers who stole all the dynamite.

topics.topic_text: I just happen to have a Deathclaw egg with me. Here.
topics.response_text: I can't believe you actually got one. Give me a bit to get the recipe set up, then talk to me again.

description:
Jas Wilkins is a 32 year-old Caucasian Female.

Jas Wilkins is the resourceful owner and head cook of the mess hall in Sloan, a small mining community in the Mojave Wasteland. Despite the hardships of life in the post-apocalyptic world, she maintains a positive outlook and a passion for cooking. Her mess hall serves as a gathering place for the miners and residents of Sloan, offering them a rare taste of decent food in the harsh wasteland.

Jas Wilkins's Personality: Jas is adventurous and ambitious, having left the safety of the NCR-controlled lands to seek her fortune in the Mojave. She dislikes boredom and strict formalism, preferring the freedom and excitement of the frontier. Despite the dangers around her, she remains resilient and determined, continuing to run her mess hall even after the Powder Ganger attack. She values family tradition and carries on her great-aunt's culinary legacy with pride.

Jas Wilkins's Backstory: Born and raised in California, Jas was drawn to the allure of New Vegas and the freedom it represented away from the Republic's regulations. She could have settled back home, working at one of the farms or mills, but the prospect of a more exciting life in the wasteland called to her. She eventually made her way to Sloan, where she established the mess hall. Her culinary talent runs in the familyâ€”her great-aunt Rose was the original creator of the famous deathclaw omelet at Rose's Bed and Breakfast. Jas has been eager to recreate this legendary recipe but lacks the key ingredient: a deathclaw egg. Her great-aunt can no longer help, as her own deathclaw was killed by a stranger some time ago. The Powder Ganger attack on Sloan's dynamite stockpile has made everyone in the community more cautious, with miners and employees now sleeping with guns nearby.
